nodes.text: Bshrah-Ky-Ushsj was a scout of the Old Republic who explored System VV-99-7JE-2N71. He would record his observations on an astrogation datacard, which were later decrypted by Professor Durns, his daughter, his business partner, and a group of spacers, who were searching for a mythical pirate ship rumored to be derelict in the VV-99-7JE-2N71 system.
